front.title: Multi Topology Routing Extensions for Transparent Interconnection of Lots of Links (TRILL)

abstract.t: This document describes an optional extensions to the TRILL protocol. The extensions uses Intermediate System to Intermediate Systems (IS-IS) as the control plane, to support multiple topologies (MT) within the same TRILL protocol instance of IS-IS. It describes how to run Multiple Independent TRILL topologies, within a single IS-IS domain.
